name: Kilodium
overview: Kilodium is a fast-paced, rather difficult mini-game shoot 'em up for the Commodore 64. It was inspired by the Andrew Brawbrook C64 classic, Uridium. The game was developed by Aleksi Eeben and released as part of the Minigame Competition 2006 - 1K Category. It was also released as part of GO64! 2006/03-05. The game has no title screen, and goes right to the gameplay after loading.
